stories.text:
A former startup employer screwed me big time on my equity portion.

Has anyone had to litigate against a former employer with an equity dispute, and have a lawyer to recommend? The startup was in California but the buyer in EU. Not sure if need to seek a lawyer in EU.
stories.title: Ask HN: Legal action against former employer
Windows Defender July Update – Deletes file from famous copyright case (DeCSS)

stories.text:
Hi HN! I’ve been considering adding solar to my home but I really have no idea where to begin. Purchase or lease? What are my giant battery options and which seems best? What kind of requirements are there for the home electrical infra (200 amp, 300 amp, doesn’t matter)? What sort of total cost of installation am I looking at for an average size house on the East Coast (MA, 2000 sqft)

Any wisdom or resources would be greatly appreciated.
stories.title: Ask HN: Recommendations for Home Solar Install?
